sentences.english: The range of turbulent velocities determines the relative proportion of small and large.
sentences.chinese: 星体大小的比例由乱流速度的快慢决定。

sentences.english: How fast you swing the putter.
The slowness and quickness of the run-up in long-jump mainly depends on the utilization rate of speed.
sentences.chinese: 跳远助跑的快慢较大程度取决于速度利用率的大小。

sentences.english: The buffering speed is controlled by the latus rectum of the buffering valve hole.
sentences.chinese: 缓冲速度的快慢由缓冲阀孔的通径决定。

definition: strong or weak/intensity/amount of force or pressure
length/duration/accident/right and wrong/good and bad/long and short

height/altitude (aviation)/pitch (music)/ups and downs (success or failure)/whether sth is right or wrong/comparative strength, weight, depth, stature/(spoken interjection) anyway, whatever/eventually, in the end
to slow down gradually/slower and slower/(music) decelerando/ritardando
whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
varying from person to person (idiom); different for each individual
